name: Bermejillo Entrance
description: A turistic place to start to see the city

name: Bermejillo Parl
description: A good place to play with kids and enjoy the day.

name: Culture House
description: A culture place to know more about the city and the history of the town.

name: Plaza las Palmas
description: Local shopping center featuring various stores.

name: Bermejillo Hospital
description: The hospital of the town, it's good to know where it is.

description: A small place to play sports in the town

description: A park in the center of the town with trees and places to rest.

name: Guadalupe Park
description: A small park in the city, is a place where the people visit often.
